div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem
quarto die mensis Septembris Anno Domini et cetera lxxxjo

The quhilke day Dauid mathesone comperit in playne court
befor the Aldirman bailyeis And in presence of Alexander rede and thomas
mar' curatis and Wille mathesone Ande perofferit him to preyf
the tennementis that the saide Dauid Inhabitis the tyme of the making'
of this Ake take to him quhill Witsunday next to cum furtht' with
but delay with sufficient prewis Sene he Hua nocht vake to byde
heir' fra the kingis seruice quhill friday cum viij dais Alsua he offeris
him eftir his hame cumyne fra the kingis seruice quhen It is lauchfull
tyme tilbe reddy to preyf the forsaide tenment his take quhill Wit
sunday next eftir the making' of this Ake protestand quhat ony party doys
agan him in the contrar' turne him to na preiudice aquhil It be lauch'
full tyme and he lauch'fully warnit

The sammyn dai in presence of the aldirman and balyeis in Jugement Johne Wor
mot grauntit him tobe awand til John' colisone' ane hambre barel of salt
salmond and tobe pait til him within terme of law

Item the sammen dai comperit Alexander rede and Thomas of marr' before the aldir
man balliez and the court / and askit the act aboue writin tobe red in the
quhilk thai ar callit curatis til Wille mathoson' and denyit that thai
ar curatis til the saide Wille mathoson' and affermyt nocht the act aboue writin

The samyn dai Alexander rede has fundin Wilyam of Kintor law borgh for him
that Dauid mathoson' salbe vndistroublit bot as law wil

Item the said Dauid mathoson' has gevin Wilyam blindsele yongar law borch
for him that alexander rede salbe vndistrublit vthirwais than law wil
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio v die septembris anno Domini supradicto

quo die
Assisa infrascripta Respectavit causam perturbij inter Alexandrum rede et Dauid ma
thoson' penes perturbium alias factum vxori dicti Dauidis et suis filiabus / ex certis
causis eos monentibus vsque hodie ad viij dies in statu quo nunc et medio tempore
dicte partes renouarunt plegios suos legales supradictos / et hoc sunt nomina assise
Robertus blindsele David symson Johannes Wormot gilbertus Vaus thomas prat adam de
crafurd Dauid Kintor alexander scrogis gilbertus leche henricus thome Ranaldus
talyour thomas quhite

Eodem die Thomas marr' clamabat quendam Joysth' flemyngum de summa xviij librarum
monete scocie pro sex librarum g' / eo quod alius petrus van the guys' astrinxit nauim suam
cum naulo / quam nauem dictus joysch gubernat ex parte dicti petri / que quidem actio posita fuit
ad assisam proborum virorum prescriptorum / vnde dicta assisa mature auisata et testibus
desuper coram eis productis decreuit et ordinavit / quod dictus joysch persolueret et delibera
ret dicto thome marr' prefatam summam xviij libre pro dictis vj li' g' infra terminum Juris

The xvij dai of Septembre the yer' of god et cetera lxxxj In the caus' and debate movit betuix
Sir Robert leis chaplan of Saint Ninianis altar on the ta part / and ser Alexander voket
chaplan on the tothir part / anent the offerand and oblacion of Sanct Niniane becaus' the
said ser Robert had nocht his evidentis chartiris na documentis toschaw for his rychtis
of the said altar in the tym he has protestit solempnitly in presence of the aldirman and consel
that the intres and intrometting made be the said ser alexander voket in the gadiring and
wptaking of the said offerand turne him to na his rycht to na preiudice na to
his successouris in tyme cuming

The xviij dai of Septembre the yer' forsaid It is ordanit be the aldirman and consale that for the
clame that Thom prat clamis of xxxti s' iiij d' tobe awand til him be the toune /
he salbe pait of the erast burges that salbe made tobe present be him that salbe plesand
to the aldirman' and consale

The samyn' dai It is ordanit and decretit be the consale / Alexander menyes aldirman beand
removit / that is tosay be thir personis Alexander chavmer of murchil James lesly Dauid
menyes Alexander rede gilbert the Waus Alexander of chavmer the son' Duncan sanchar' of murcroft
androw branche thomas prat Johne Wormot William blindsel yongar thom of marr
androw culan Dauid marr Adam of crafurd Alexander nachti and Dauid symson' / that becaus'
the toune is superexpendit this yer' bigane / The said Alexander menyes aldirman has
grauntit togif his compt til certane sworn' persons within twenty daies eftir
his furth passing of his compt / that he be awand ony sowmes to the toune /
he sal mak payment incontinent tharof / to the towne / And gif it beis fundin be
the saidis personis auditouris / that the toune be awand til him / the towne assignis
the gressomes of the last Assedacion to the said aldirman Alexander menyes
quhil he be pait of the Soumez acht il him quhat evir thai extend to / et cetera

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene be the balyeis of that ilk the xx dai
of Septembre the yer' et cetera lxxxj / It wes determinyt and deliuerit be ane sworn assise
that James of Douglas schipman is dettour til Sandris marr for xxiiij s' of his
hous' mail / and the said James in amerciament of this curt for the wrangwis' withhal
ding tharof / and til content the said Sandris of his mail within terme of law

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxiiij die Septembris anno
Domini supradicto /

quo die actio mota inter Willelmum blindsel iuniorem et Jacobum de Kintor penes
solucionem firme dimidietatis Rethis de le potwattir posita fuit ad assisam proborum virorum
ad hoc iuratorum / quj deliberarunt quod dictus Willelmus blindsel debet persoluere et satis
facere firmas dicti dimidij rethis preposito et ballivis ville / Et quod dictus Jacobus isto die
ad octo dies probabit suam solucionem dicte piscarie dimidij rethis aque supradicte dicto
Willelmo factam in curia huius burgi

xxvj die mensis et annj supradictorum / Dominus fyndelaus vicarius de lungley fecit et
ordinavit thomam prat suum procuratorem in presencia prepositi et ballivorum ad prosequendum Ni
cholaium baxtar / pro certa summa pecunie sibi pro frumento debito in forma Juris solita et
consueta promittendo de Rato et cetera

Die penultima septembris anno quo supra in pretorio coram preposito thomas de culan'
deuenit plegius pro Andrea lambynton' ad intrandum eundem in curia huius burgi die
lune proximo futuro responsurus et Juri periturus pro perturbio Andree branch vnius
ballivorum in ministracione sui officij Ad quam curiam premuniti sunt gilbertus de camera
et lindesay harraldus tanquam testes ad perhibendum fidele testimonium in huiusmodi causa

primo die octobris anno supradicto Wilelmus portar' Receptus fuit in liberum
burgensem et fratrem gilde huius burgi tanquam filius fratris gilde pro eo quod dispon
sauit filiam quondam murthaci glastre burgensis huius burgi / pro v s' in alba bursa
prestito Juramento solito

Eodem die Johannes low receptus est in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde huius
burgi pro l s' solutis preposito nomine communitatis prestito solito juramento

Item eodem die patricius lesly de balquhane Receptus est in liberum burgensem
et fratrem gilde huius burgi de consensu communis consilij et communitatis pro v s' in bursa
prestito solito Juramento

The vj day of october the yer et cetera fourscor and ane Jhone chapman eldar comperit befor the
Aldirman ande balyeis sitand' in jugement offerit him to suer' that he deliuerit on' the behalf
of maistir William anfra to William his brodir ane barrel of salmond' of his avn' fiching
tane the quhilk barrel wos' merkit with maistir Williamis propir merk quhilk barel Androw
branch has takin and Intromettit with' allegand at he has reson' to It befor ony
othiris

Curia Capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem primo die
mensis octobris Anno Domini mo CCCCmo lxxxjmo / quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata
absentes patent in Rotulo sectarum

Eodem die Jacobus lesly electus fuit in officium prepositure huius burgi pro anno
sequente / et ad deseruiendum fideliter in dicto officio Juramentum / prestitit corporale

Dauid menyes alexander rede Johannes de culan et Johannes Wormot electi fue
runt in officio balliuorum pro anno futuro et ad deseruiendum in dicto officio fideliter pro communi commodo
Juramenta prestiterunt corporalia

Et eodem die philippus de Dunbrek alexander de camera Dauid Duncanj et
Duncanus straloch electi fuerunt et continuant in officio seriandorum pro vno anno prestito solito Juramento

Item eodem die actio mota et dependens inter Willelmum blindsel iuniorem et Jacobum de Kintor
penes probacionem solucionis firme dimidij rethis de le potwattir vt in actio precedenti habetur
continuatur cum consensu parcium in statu quo nunc vsque ad tercium diem huius mensis octobris

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Alexander voket capellanus collector ac procurator
capellanorum ecclesie parrochialis de abirdene / protestabatur pro quodam annuo redditu tresdecim
solidorum et iiijor d' dictis capellanis annuatim debit' et a longo tempore non solut' de quadam
terra Jacente in superi parte vici de le schipraw inter terram Alexandri de camera ex parte occidentali
et terram thome prat ex parte australi Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
pro dicto annuo redditu recuperando preter terram et lapides quos presentavit in sacculo in curia coram
ballivis tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus Roberto mernach et Duncano hervy
burgensibus ac Duncano straloch seriando

Item eodem die Thomas prat protestabatur pro vno annuo redditu viginti duorum solido
rum eidem annuatim et hereditarie debit' de quadam terra iacente in le schipraw inter terram
thome quhite ex parte australi et terram Alexandri de camera ex boriali parte tam de terra
interiori quam anteriori / Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presen
tavit in curia coram ballivis tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Johanne chepman in vico castri Willelmo
coming scissore et philippo de Dunbrek seriando

Item eodem die sponsa henrici mortymer de mandato litteratorio eiusdem accedens ad barram protestabatur
nomine dicti mariti suj pro quodam annuo redditu x s' de terra Jacente in li grene vt patet in rotulamento
secundi diei processus Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presen
tavit in curia coram ballivis tanquam tercio die huius processus / testibus Duncano cardny Andrea lowson
et Dauid Duncanj seriando

div.head: Commune consilium
div.p:
Eodem die subscripti electi fuerunt et Jurati in communes consiliarios videlicet Johannes androson David Kintor
thomas prat Johannes stevinson alexander hay thomas de marr' andreas culan gilbertus morison alexander nachti Robertus
prat Johannes glenmalvin andreas rettre Walterus achneif Willelmus tulidef Willelmus more Johannes more
Willelmus hay Johannes gregory adam de crafurd andreas atkyn gilbertus leche Ricardus culan

Quinto die octobris Anno Domini et cetera lxxxjo persone subscripte electe sunt auditores computi Alexandri
menyes prepositi anno preterito prestito Juramento et cetera
Johannes Knollis
Robertus blindsel
Dauid symson'
Thomas prat
Alexander hovison'
Johannes Vormot
gilbertus Vaus'
Alexander' rede
Eodem die Dauid symson' ellectus fuit in decanum gilde pro present AnnoAnno presente prestito solito Juramento

The sammyn day It is ordanit be the Aldirman and the consel that nane' Ale salbe sauld'
derar thane viij d' ane gallon' that be gud of the price vndir the pane of law
Alswa at othir ale be sauld for vj d' the derast of al vnfre folk And It be nocht worth
vj d' the gallon At It be sel' for iiij d'

It is ordanit the sammyn' day be the Aldirman and the consel that the ij d' laif sal hald
xxviij vns of weil bakin brede and of gud stuf and the penne laif xiiij wns and
na les vndir the pane of law

Et est memorandum In Curia capitali precedenti tenta primo die octobris anno Domini supradicto
Accedens ad barram Johannes de Kintor filius et heres quondam gilberti de Kintor protestabatur
pro quodam annuo redditu xiiijcim solidorum sibi annuatim debit' de vna terra Jacente in vico
furcarum inter terram gilberti leche ex boriali parte et terram Ricardi culan ex parte australi
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile pro dicto annuo redditu preter terram et lapides
quos presentavit in curia coram ballivis in sacculo tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus Jacobo
crag Johanne narne burgensibus et Dauid Duncanj seriando Juratis et examinatis in curia

Curia burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem tercio die octobris anno Domini et cetera
lxxxjmo /

quo die actio mota inter Jacobum de Kintor ex vna et Willelmum blindsele iuniorem
ex altera partibus de et super detencione firme dimidij rethis de le potwattir clamat' per
dictum Willelmum et penes solucionem eiusdem / posita fuit ad assisam proborum virorum tanquam
in die limitato dicto Jacobo ad probandum solucionem dicte firme / que quidem assisa mature auisa
ta testibus vocatis et Juratis / decreuit et deliberavit quod dictus Jacobus quitus
fuit de solucione firme dicti dimidij rethis et de clameo eiusdem

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio viij die octobris anno Domini supradicto Alexander fyndelai car
nifex adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Willelmi raa in ministracione officij
appreciatoris carnium

Eodem die Archy monylawis in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione octo solidorum ab henrico
bawne / et tenetur satisfacere eidem infra terminum Juris

div.head: Gustatores ceruisie
div.p:
Johannes carle et Thomas talyour Judicator curie pro li evin quartar / Georgeus Dys' et Andreas
mare pro li crukit quartar Willelmus fet et Willelmus cuming pro quarterio de greyn' Nicholaius leil
et Johannes de cowis pro quarterio de futy

div.head: Appreciatores carnium
div.p:
Alexander scrogis Duncanus smyth andreas goldsmyth / andreas ancroft thomas quhite Ranaldus
talyour Johannes de glenmalvine alexander rolland andreas scot et Willelmus raa

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per Dauid menyes Alexandrum rede et
Johannem Wormot tres ballivorum eiusdem xv die octobris anno Domini et cetera lxxxj

Inquisicionis nomina Andreas culan Duncanus smyth Willelmus de tulidef Johannes talyour thomas
gardner andreas scot henricus bawne magnus Wormot Jacobus clerk Willelmus coupar alexander scrogis
Johannes chapman Johannes litstar

Eodem die Jacobus de Kintor primo die vocatus responsurus plegio super ipsum extenso per Duncanum
smyth in manum philippi Dunbrek seriendi pro iniusta detencione v marcarum a dicto Duncano
comparuit / et peciit diem legalem ad respondendum et ballivi assignauerunt eidem hodie ad xvnam

Item eodem die Andreas branche porrexit plegium in manu Duncanj straloch seriendi
quod dictus Jacobus de Kintor iniuste detinet ab eo viij libras et vij s' vnde idem
Jacobus peciit diem legalem ad respondendum dicto plegio et ballivi assignauerunt eidem hodie
ad xvnam et cetera

The xix dai of october the yer' forsaid Johne of lambynton' straik a borgh on
Dauid hil in the handis of philp of Dunbrek seriand' / that wrangusly he held fra
him the some' of xxiij li' eftir the tenor of his obligacion / the quhilk Dauid hil askit
Dauid menyes eldar tobe avisit / the quhilk beand avisit askit a lauchful dai
that is tosay monondai cum xv dais as dai peremptour til answer and vndirly the knau
lage of ane assise of the said borch
Curia tenta in pretorio per ballivos xxijdo die octobris anno supradicto /

quo die Alexander rede
porrexit plegio super Andream ancroft de iniusta alienacione vnius cobil ab eo qui quidem
andream per prelocutorem suum thomam fife peciit diem legalem ad respondendum dicto plegio et ballivi assigna
uerunt eidem hodie ad quindenam

Willelmus robertson in amerciamento per concessionem propriam pro perturbio Johannis nory et in partem emende dabit j li'
cere ad missam Sancti sanguinis

In the balye court haldin in the tolbuthe the xxv dai of october yer' forsaid It
wes deliuerit be ane sworn assise anent a half barel of salmond clamyt be
Dauid menyes eldar fra marion' of buchan the spous' of vmquhile William
of buchan / that it is appointit before the sammyn assise betuix the saidis parties / that
the said marion' in contentacion tharof / sal pay til the said Dauid menyes ten s'
that is tosay v s' at paisch and vthir v s' at mydsummyr next tocum / but
langar dilay To the quhilk scho is bundin be the faith of hir body
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxvj die octobris anno Dominj et cetera lxxxjo

quo die
Johannes colisone' filius et heres quondam Dauid colison' burgensis huius burgi peciit a ballivis pro tribunali
sedentibus se congnosci ad terras sibi Jure hereditario pertinentes vt moris est in burgis Et ideo ex decre
to curie inuinctum fuit Dauid menyes vnj ballivorum huius burgi quod vadat et cognoscat
dictum Johannem coram testibus ad easdem terras vt moris est et cetera

In curia tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxvij die octobris anno Dominj et cetera lxxxj Johannes lammynton'
et Andreas lowson accusati ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento pro fracione communis ordinacionis in vendicione carnium non appreciat'
per concessiones proprias

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxix die octobris
anno Dominj supradicto

Quo die Jacobus de Kintor primo die vocatus ad sectam Andree branch Non comparuit Ideo
precipitur philippo de Dunbrek seriando capere districtum et cetera et premunire eundem Jacobum ad proximam
curiam legalem tanquam ad secundum diem huius processus

Eodem die Jacobus de Kintor primo die vocatus ad sectam Duncanj smyth Non comparuit quare precipitur
dicto seriando capere districtum de dicto Jacobo et citare eundem vt supra

In curia tenta in pretorio per ballivos secundo die Nouembris anno quo supra Johannes henrison adiudicatus
fuit in amerciamento curie pro iniusta porrectione plegij super patricium styklaw propter iniustam intromissionem
vnius ?? et dictus patricius quitus de clameo suo per assisam

The samen dai Wil huntar in amerciament of the court for the wrangwis' iniuris and layr
of his cattale in ser Alexander vocatis yarde as wes fundin be ane assise

Item marion' Wil huntaris wif in amerciament for the wrangwis' away taking of ser Alexander
vocatis cayl / and til amend til him as law wil

Item the said Wil huntar in amerciament for caus' his dykis ar vnlauful throu the quhilkis
ser thomas hervy has sustenit gret scath of his yarde bath in cail and froyt / Item in ane
vthir amerciament for the strublance and reboytine of the said ser thomas in worde

Item the samyn dai William cryne in amerciament anent a borch strekin be gilbert mori
son apon the said Wilyam / that he aw to free him of xx s' of annuale for the quhilk the
said gilbertis poynd lyis in pawnde with ser Alexander club that is tosay a siluer spoyn'
the quhilk the assise has ordanit the said Wilyam for tofree the spone and topay the
annuale

In the court of the burgh of abirdene haldin in the tolbuthe be the ballies of the sammyn the
vj dai of Nouembre the yer' et cetera lxxxj

The vij day of Nouember yer et cetera iiijxx and ane the Aldirman consel ande communite of the brugh'
of abirdene the communite gadrit throw warning of the belman ryply and weill avisit with
ane assent nane' sayande the contra / has deliuerit and ordinyt becaus' that Robert elect'
confirmat of Abirdene has schavine hym vnkindly in the ristricion' of the secund tend'
of Abirdene quhilk is gevine be his predecessor beschop thomas spens quhom'
god assolye to the biging of the quer of Abirdene the forsaid Aldirman consel ande
communite has decretit deliuerit and ordinyt that nane nychtbur duelland within the said
brugh' sal mak na finans to the said Robert Elect' na yet to nane of his
factoris on his behalf Ande quhat ever he be At dois in contrar of this act' sal
tyne his fredon' and his tak sall waik and in continent be desponit At the wil and
sycht of the aldirman consel and communite of the said brugh' but ony faworis'

In the court of the burgh of abirdene haldin in the tolbuthe be the balyeis of that ilk
the xiiij dai of nouembre the yer' forsaid Dauid ayison' wes adiugit in amerciament
of the court for the wrangwis' wpstreking of Wil richardsonis pak of lynt and
til amend the scaith as law wil / And the assise has ordanit gif the said
Dauid may lauchfully preve on friday before the balyeis that the said
William bad the said Dauid stryk vp his pak / he is quyte of the scaith

The samen dai the assise has ordanit and deliuerit that the said Dauid ayison' skippar
sal content and pay til henry mortymer v boundis of lynt als gude as ony in his
loft for the scath that the said henry has sustenit throu the skippar in the weting
of his pak of lynt

Item the assise has determynit and deliuerit that thre merchand men salbe sworn' to
prise and see the scaith of adam andirsonis lynt sustenit throu the said Dauid
ayison' skippar as said is And quhat the said iij merchand men fyndis him sca
thit the skippar sal content and pay him tharof
Curia tenta in pretorio per ballivos burgi de Abirdene xvj die novembris anno et cetera lxxxjo

quo die thomas Dauidson' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione xvj s'
et viij d' a Johanne colly prout deliberat' fuit per assisam et quod satisfaciet
eidem infra terminum Juris

Eodem die Willelmus Dersso Willelmus richardson' et Johannes thomson ipsorum quilibet
in amerciamento curie pro foristallacione huius burgi ex deliberacione assise

The xx dai of nouembre the yer' forsaid comperit before the balyeis in Jugement Wil richard
son' with his forspekar thomas of fife offerand him redy to ressaue the prefis that
Dauid ayison' skippar suld haf producit anent the action betuix thaim deliuerit be
ane assise of a pak of lynt / the quhilk skippar brocht na prefis and falyeit tharin / and the
said William protestit for amendis of his scaith as it wes deliuerit be the assise et cetera
Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxiiij die nouembris anno et cetera lxxxjo

The samyn dai Johne vascal and Johne paris' enterit In the first twa lastis of saip
viij botis of malvasy / twa pypis of succur' / twa pipis and a fat of batry pottis
pannys and kettillis / twa pipis of alme / foure pypis with mercery kairdis chamlate
dornyk brade clath kniffis and vthir smal merchandis' jC li' of peppir'

Item the samen dai the borch strekin be thomas spaldyne burges of Dunde apon cor
nelis / cornelsone maistir of the schip callit mary grace for the wrangwis' with
halding of the some' of xxij li' x s' scottis of lent siluer eftir the tenour of ane obligacioun
made tharupon / the quhilk some' the said Cornelis denyit in a fenssit court /
the quhilk action was put til ane assise of honorable sworn' personis / The
quhilk assise riply avisit / deliuerit that the said Cornelis suld content and pay
the forsaid some' to the said thomas eftir the tenour of his obligacion / and the said
cornelis in amerciament of the court / for the wranguis' withhalding of the saide
some' / and tocontent the said some' within terme of law

The same day Dauid ayison' skippar producit in witnes anent a barrel of tar'
debatabil betuix Robert ewynson and Johne smyth bocht in Danskyn' / the gret
aith sworn has deponit / that the said Johne smyth payit the first siluer
for the said barrel of tar' / and eftir the payment / made tharfor ilkane of the saidis persons
put thare mark apon the forsaid barel

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxvj die mensis
nouembris Anno Dominj supradicto

The quhilk dai Androw galichtly burges of Dunde present a write of certane gudis deliuerit be
him in keping before the aldirman and balyeis of this burgh til gilbert the vaus til the be
hufe of the merchand that aw thaim quhat evir he be / And this is the copy of thesam write
Memorandum est that thar is in gilbert the vaus' hous' at the key x pottis and ij pannys Item a reym
of bowte clath Item iiijor bowtis of blak fustian Item a poke of peppir Item thre gross' of rede
laissis Item four' half pundis of lynkamtwyne Item x skenyettis of pak threde Item j li' of haw
threde Item a certan of prenys Item ijc of hemp and demi / demi li' les Item xiij hankis of huke wyre
Item xxviij eln' of holand clath

Eodem die Thomas spadyn' burgensis de Dunde constituit et ordinavit Thomam
fyf Alexandrum chamer Juniorem et Johannem colison suos procuratores coniunctim et divisim
nomine suo ad petendum et Recipiendum A cornelio corneilson' xxij li' et xx s'
secundum tenorem Acti precedentis

Eodem die Thomas colly cullan vocatus ad sectam gilberti morison' pro iniusta
detencione quinque solidorum grossorum monete flandrie cum maiore ad bonum
compoi non comparuit quare precipitur Dauid Duncanj seriando quod premuniat eundem thomam
quod compareat hodie ad xvam tanquam secundo die processus / et ad capiendum districtum

Eodem die Jacobus Kintor' vocatus ad sectam Duncanj smytht tanquam secundo die processus
non comparuit / Igitur precipitur philippo Dunbreke seriando quitus premuniant dictum
Jacobum ad comparendum hodie ad xvam tam 3o die huius processus et cetera Et ad
capiendum districtum et cetera

Eodem die Jacobus Kintor vocatus ad sectam Andree branche tanquam secundo die huius processus
non comparuit Igitur precipitur Duncano straloche capere districtum et cetera Et ad citandum
eundem Jacobum ad comparendum hodie ad xvam tanquam 3o die huius processus et cetera

The samyn dai Dauid aveson skippar of the schip of Dundee entirit before the balyeis in
the tolbuthe eftir as it wes assignit til him be the balyeis til answer' to the wif of
James libbirton' for the wrangwis' withhalding fra hir and hir husband of vj bow
stafis / the quhilk wif comperit nocht not nane vthir on hir behalf to folow the said Dauid

Item the said dai throu the deliuerence of ane assise gilbert morison was adiugit in amerciament
for the wrangwis withhalding of v s' of annuel of the terme of martymes last bypast fra ser
Alexander club / and til content him as law wil

Inquisicio Robertus blindsel Dauid symson alexander howison gilbertus vaus Johannes vaus andreas branche
macolmus mowat et gilbertus morison Qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam Alexander blindsele frater Johannis
blindsele latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de
feodo vnius crofti vocati le halylandis cum pertinenciis Jacentis prope pontem latronum burgi de abirdene
inter croftum Alexandri menyes ex boriali parte ab vna / et croftum Johannis de marr' ex australi parte
ab altera / Et quod dictus Johannes est legittimus et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam Alexandri fratris sui de feodo dictj
croftj cum pertinenciis / et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dictum croftum cum pertinenciis valet nunc per annuum libere
xij s' et tantum valuit tempore pacis solutis annujs redditibus inde debitis Et quod tenetur in
capite de domino nostro Rege in libero burgagio / et quod liberum tenementum dicti crofti cum pertinenciis nunc existit
in manibus Willelmi blindsele senioris patris dicti quondam alexandri blindsele reseruat' sibi pro tempore vite sue
feodum dicti crofti cum pertinenciis nunc existit in manibus domini nostri Regis tanquam in manibus domini superioris eiusdem causa mortis
dicti quondam alexandri blindsele et a tempore obitus eiusdem per spacium vnius annj vel eocirca In defectu veri heredis
Jus suum minime prosequentis

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxvij die nouembris / Anno
Domini et cetera lxxxjmo

The quhilk dai comperit before the aldirman and balyeis in Jugement Cornelis corneilson'
maistir of the brokin schip callit mary grace and grantit him tilhaf sauld and deliuerit his
schip bote with four' ayris and ane ende of a tros / til thom of Kirkcavdy and Wil
tod his botismen for x crownys in ful payment of thare hyris and labouris done til
him / and ilkane of thaim content of vthir

The xxviij dai of nouembre the yer' forsaid / before Johne Wormot ane of the balyeis / thom
of benyn litstar grantit him tobe awand til Dauid menyes eldar fourty schillingis / quhilkis
he oblisit him topay til the said Dauid or til philp of Dunbrek seriand in his name at
thir termes vndirwritin / that is tosay at yule next tocum ten s' / and at fasternsevin thareftir
x s' at Witsonday ten s' and at lammes next thareftir x s' in ful payment of the said some
but ony langar' dilay et cetera

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem penultimo die nouem
bris Anno Domini et cetera lxxxjmo

The quhilkis day the aldirman and bailyeis has assignit the first day of
December as day of peremptori to Jhon' of parys til Ansuer' to the skippar
for' his frauchtis

The samyn day cornelius corneylson' skippar comperit in Jugement with consent
of his avnaris that Is to say Jhon' of parys' and sere Dauid Waus procurator'
for Johne' the Waus and has sellit the wracke of thar schip to fyndlaw fores
and Jhon' henryson' to pay his child' hiris
